Detailed Description

This file defines a set of utility classes.

Definition at line 945 of file stUtil.h.

#define randomevent (   p)    (drand() <= (p))

Simulates a random event with a probability p of success. The value of p will never be verified.

Parameters
pThe probability of success.
Returns
True for success or false otherwise.
Author
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino.nosp@m.@icm.nosp@m.c.usp.nosp@m..br)

#define rngrand (   low,
  hi 
)    ((((hi) - (low)) * drand()) + (low))

Returns a random number between 2 arbitrary values. This function will not work if low is larger or equal to hi.

Parameters
lowThe lower bound.
hiThe uppper bound.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct stDistanceIndex stDistanceIndex

This structure holds a pair Distance/Index. It also defines a comparison operator which allows the use of sort algorithm from stdc++lib.

Author
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino.nosp@m.@icm.nosp@m.c.usp.nosp@m..br)
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvie.nosp@m.ira@.nosp@m.icmc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)
typedef struct stQueryPriorityQueueValue stQueryPQueueValue

This struct implements the value type used in the global priority queue used by queries. It implements the operator = as required by stDynamicRPriorityQueue and stRPriorityQueue.

Author
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino.nosp@m.@icm.nosp@m.c.usp.nosp@m..br)
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvie.nosp@m.ira@.nosp@m.icmc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)

Function Documentation

template<class T >
int MaxN ( int  n,
T *  values 
)

Finds the maximum value among n values. It uses an O(N) algorithm to find it and returns the index of the maximum value in the array. Each entry must support at least the > operator.

Author

bool TriangularInequality ( stDistance  ab,
stDistance  ac,
stDistance  bc 
)
inline

Tests the triangular inequality.

Parameters
abDistance between A and B.
acDistance between A and C.
bcDistance between B and C.
Returns
True if the 3 distaces don't break the triangular inequality.
